title: A merrie ballad, called, Christs kirk on the green
author: James I, King of England, 1566-1625, attributed name.
publisher: Imprinted for Patrick Wilson, upon the Malt Mercat,
notes: Verse - "Was never in Scotland heard nor seen,".
Attributed to King James I of Scotland by Thomason.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
